uk.knightz.knightzapi.lang

Class Chat

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.knightz.knightzapi.lang.Chat

  • public class Chat
extends Object
    A Utility class of various Chat related functions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String center(String text)
      Attempt to center a String of text in the default Minecraft Chat Window.
      static List<String> color(List<String> msgs)
      Color a list of Strings If the given List is null, then an empty List is returned
      static String color(String msg)
      Apply color codes to a given String
      static String decolor(String msg)
      Strip colors from a given String

    • Method Detail

      • color

        public static String color(String msg)
        Apply color codes to a given String
        Parameters:
        msg - The String to colorize
        Returns:
        The colorized String

      • decolor

        public static String decolor(String msg)
        Strip colors from a given String
        Parameters:
        msg - The colored String
        Returns:
        The String with all colors removed

      • color

        public static List<String> color(List<String> msgs)
        Color a list of Strings If the given List is null, then an empty List is returned
        Parameters:
        msgs - The list of Strings to colorize
        Returns:
        The List of Strings with each element colorized.

      • center

        public static String center(String text)
        Attempt to center a String of text in the default Minecraft Chat Window. Obviously, this doesn't take changed settings into account.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to center
        Returns:
        An attempt at centering the text.
